mapper.insert: Insert into event_employee (role, employee_id, event_id) values (#{eventEmployee.role}, #{eventEmployee.employeeId}, #{eventEmployee.eventId})
mapper.sql: Select ee.id as event_employee_id, ee.role as event_employee_role, ee.employee_id as event_employee_employee_id, ee.event_id as event_employee_event_id emp.id as employee_id, emp.first_name as employee_first_name, emp.last_name as employee_last_name, emp.address as employee_address, emp.phone as employee_phone, emp.email as employee_email, emp.salary as employee_salary, ev.id as event_id, ev.name as event_name, ev.theme as event_theme, ev.base_ticket_price as event_base_ticket_price, ev.start_date as event_start_date, ev.end_date as event_end_date, ev.address as event_address, ev.description as event_description from event_employee ee left join employee emp on emp.id = ee.employee_id left join event ev on ev.id = ee.event_id
mapper.update: Update event_employee set role = #{event.role}, employee_id = #{event.employeeId}, event_id = #{event.eventId}, where id = #{id}
